creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: five parts; with feathers in gold lacquer and shell inlay on a nashiji ground
medium: Lacquer, nashiji, gold, silver, black hiramakie, takamakie, aogai inlays
title: [Inrō showing scattered hawk feathers, phesant feathers]
